noty.success: Disable node {name} task to be distributed successfully
Enable node {name} task to be distributed successfully

disableNodeDialog.header: Confirm to Disable the Storage Node {name}?
disableNodeDialog.content: Please confirm to disable node {name}, the node will be removed from storage system when it is operated successfully. Please backup or migrate the data before the action.

enableNodeDialog.header: Confirm to Enable the Storage Node {name}
enableNodeDialog.content: Please confirm to enable node {name}, the node will be managed by Local Storage Manager.
